visualobjects

Class VisualClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • visualobjects.VisualObject<T>
      • visualobjects.ResizableAndMovableVisualObject<LogicalClass>
        • visualobjects.VisualClass
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AsciiTypable, FunctionTypable, Typable, DeleteListener, DeleteSubject, UpdateListener, UpdateSubject, Editable

    public class VisualClass
extends ResizableAndMovableVisualObject<LogicalClass>
implements Editable
    The visualization of a logicalClass
